I'd like to reinforce Mark's message.  In southeastern MI - I'd concur that
Fortune Five companies (and many smaller) are two (plus) years away from
moving to Java 1.5 and indirections .. er . I mean annotations.

 

_Marvin

 

 

Posted by: "Mark Levison"
<mailto:mlevison@...?Subject=Re:%20JUnit%204%2Ex%20and%20support%20for
%20Java%201%2E4> mlevison@...
<http://profiles.yahoo.com/marklevison> marklevison 

Tue Sep 12, 2006 7:35 am (PST) 

Kent (and other JUnit 4 developers) - has any consideration been given to
support Java 1.4 with JUnit 4.xx. 

 

Unfortunately some of us work in corporate environments where use of Java
1.5 will take at least another couple of years (we only just dropped support
for Java 1.3).
